data.actual_result: The client lags as you click and the graphics on the checkbox appear broken.
data.expected_result: The Activity tab does not lag and the graphics on the checkbox do not appear broken.
data.short_description: Clicking the Show on Games Tab checkbox on the Activity screen rapidly will lag the client and show a somewhat broken checkbox.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user underneath a game. - Right click on them or select the three dots. - Rapidly click the "Show on Games Tab" button.
